title: 4 Simple Steps to Install WeChat on Android

steps.title: It’s the rainbow triangle icon labeled “Play Store.”
steps.content: It’s the rainbow triangle icon labeled “Play Store.” You’ll find it either on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Type wechat into the search bar.
steps.content: Type wechat into the search bar. It’s at the top of the screen. A list of search results will appear as you type.

steps.title: Tap WeChat.
steps.content: Tap WeChat . It has a green icon with two white chat bubbles. This opens the app’s home page.

steps.title: Tap INSTALL.
steps.content: Tap INSTALL . It’s near the right side of the screen. If prompted, tap ACCEPT to confirm the installation. When the installation is complete, the “INSTALL” button will change to “OPEN,” and a WeChat icon will be added to your app list.
